General.Name: DMS Propertindo Tbk PT
General.Description: PT DMS Propertindo Tbk operates as a property development and hospitality management company in Indonesia. The company constructs residential buildings. It also owns and operates three hotels, including ZEST Hotel and FABU Hotel. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT DMS Propertindo Tbk is a subsidiary of PT DMS Investama.
General.Address: Gedung Graha Mampang, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12760

5.Name: Mr. Lukasz Andrzej Redzinski
